{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
  
  <rect x='200' y='100' width='400' height='400' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='10' ry='10' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  
  <text x='400' y='160' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#333333' text-anchor='middle'>ログイン</text>
  
  <rect x='250' y='200' width='300' height='50' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='25' ry='25' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='270' y='230' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#999999'>ユーザー名またはメールアドレス</text>
  
  <rect x='250' y='270' width='300' height='50' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='25' ry='25' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='270' y='300' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#999999'>パスワード</text>
  
  <rect x='250' y='340' width='300' height='50' fill='#4A90E2' rx='25' ry='25'/>
  <text x='400' y='370' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF' text-anchor='middle'>ログイン</text>
  
  <text x='400' y='420' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#4A90E2' text-anchor='middle'>パスワードをお忘れですか？</text>
  
  <line x1='250' y1='450' x2='550' y2='450' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  
  <text x='400' y='480' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333' text-anchor='middle'>アカウントをお持ちでない方は</text>
  <text x='400' y='500' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#4A90E2' text-anchor='middle'>新規登録</text>
  
  <circle cx='230' cy='225' r='10' fill='#50E3C2'/>
  <path d='M225 225 L230 230 L240 220' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
  
  <circle cx='230' cy='295' r='10' fill='#50E3C2'/>
  <path d='M225 295 L230 300 L240 290' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/>
</svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width=\"800\" height=\"600\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\">
    <rect width=\"800\" height=\"600\" fill=\"#F8F8F8\"/>
    
    <rect x=\"200\" y=\"50\" width=\"400\" height=\"500\" rx=\"10\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#E0E0E0\" stroke-width=\"1\"/>
    
    <text x=\"400\" y=\"100\" font-family=\"Arial, sans-serif\" font-size=\"24\" fill=\"#333333\" text-anchor=\"middle\">新規登録</text>
    
    <rect x=\"250\" y=\"140\" width=\"300\" height=\"50\" rx=\"5\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
    <text x=\"270\" y=\"170\" font-family=\"Arial, sans-serif\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#999999\">ユーザー名</text>
    
    <rect x=\"250\" y=\"210\" width=\"300\" height=\"50\" rx=\"5\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
    <text x=\"270\" y=\"240\" font-family=\"Arial, sans-serif\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#999999\">メールアドレス</text>
    
    <rect x=\"250\" y=\"280\" width=\"300\" height=\"50\" rx=\"5\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
    <text x=\"270\" y=\"310\" font-family=\"Arial, sans-serif\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#999999\">パスワード</text>
    
    <rect x=\"250\" y=\"350\" width=\"300\" height=\"50\" rx=\"5\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
    <text x=\"270\" y=\"380\" font-family=\"Arial, sans-serif\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#999999\">パスワード（確認）</text>
    
    <rect x=\"250\" y=\"420\" width=\"300\" height=\"50\" rx=\"25\" fill=\"#4A90E2\"/>
    <text x=\"400\" y=\"452\" font-family=\"Arial, sans-serif\" font-size=\"18\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" text-anchor=\"middle\">登録</text>
    
    <text x=\"400\" y=\"510\" font-family=\"Arial, sans-serif\" font-size=\"14\" fill=\"#333333\" text-anchor=\"middle\">すでにアカウントをお持ちの方は</text>
    <text x=\"400\" y=\"530\" font-family=\"Arial, sans-serif\" font-size=\"14\" fill=\"#4A90E2\" text-anchor=\"middle\" text-decoration=\"underline\">こちらからログイン</text>
    
    <circle cx=\"230\" cy=\"165\" r=\"10\" fill=\"#50E3C2\"/>
    <path d=\"M225 165 L235 165 M230 160 L230 170\" stroke=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
    
    <circle cx=\"230\" cy=\"235\" r=\"10\" fill=\"#50E3C2\"/>
    <path d=\"M225 235 L235 235 M230 230 L230 240\" stroke=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
    
    <circle cx=\"230\" cy=\"305\" r=\"10\" fill=\"#50E3C2\"/>
    <path d=\"M225 305 L235 305 M230 300 L230 310\" stroke=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
    
    <circle cx=\"230\" cy=\"375\" r=\"10\" fill=\"#50E3C2\"/>
    <path d=\"M225 375 L235 375 M230 370 L230 380\" stroke=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
  </svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
    
    <!-- ナビゲーションバー -->
    <rect x='0' y='0' width='800' height='60' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <text x='20' y='40' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>フリータイムシェア</text>
    <circle cx='750' cy='30' r='20' fill='#FFFFFF'/>
    <text x='745' y='38' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#4A90E2'>👤</text>
    
    <!-- 予定リスト -->
    <rect x='20' y='80' width='360' height='480' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='10'/>
    <text x='40' y='120' font-family='Arial' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>あなたの予定</text>
    <line x1='40' y1='140' x2='360' y2='140' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='2'/>
    <text x='40' y='180' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>13:00 - 14:30 会議</text>
    <text x='40' y='220' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>15:00 - 16:00 買い物</text>
    <text x='40' y='260' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>18:00 - 19:30 ジム</text>
    
    <!-- 友達の暇な時間タイムライン -->
    <rect x='400' y='80' width='380' height='480' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='10'/>
    <text x='420' y='120' font-family='Arial' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>友達の暇な時間</text>
    <line x1='420' y1='140' x2='760' y2='140' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='2'/>
    <rect x='420' y='160' width='340' height='40' fill='#50E3C2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='430' y='185' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>田中 10:00 - 12:00</text>
    <rect x='420' y='210' width='170' height='40' fill='#50E3C2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='430' y='235' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>佐藤 14:00 - 15:00</text>
    <rect x='420' y='260' width='255' height='40' fill='#50E3C2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='430' y='285' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>鈴木 16:30 - 18:45</text>
    
    <!-- 予定追加ボタン -->
    <circle cx='720' cy='520' r='40' fill='#F5A623'/>
    <text x='705' y='530' font-family='Arial' font-size='40' fill='#FFFFFF'>+</text>
  </svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
    
    <rect x='20' y='20' width='760' height='60' fill='#4A90E2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='40' y='60' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>予定追加</text>
    
    <text x='40' y='140' font-family='Arial' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>開始時間</text>

    <text x='60' y='192' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>13:00</text>
    <path d='M350 180 L370 180 L360 195 Z' fill='#4A90E2'/>

    <path d='M730 180 L750 180 L740 195 Z' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    
    <rect x='40' y='240' width='30' height='30' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
    <path d='M45 255 L55 265 L70 245' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/>
    <text x='80' y='262' font-family='Arial' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>暇な時間</text>
    
    <rect x='40' y='300' width='720' height='200' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1' rx='5'/>
    <text x='60' y='340' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#999999'>メモを入力（オプション）</text>
    
    <rect x='40' y='520' width='340' height='60' fill='#50E3C2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='165' y='560' font-family='Arial' font-size='20' fill='#FFFFFF'>保存</text>
    
    <rect x='420' y='520' width='340' height='60' fill='#F5A623' rx='5'/>
    <text x='535' y='560' font-family='Arial' font-size='20' fill='#FFFFFF'>キャンセル</text>
  </svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
    
    <rect x='20' y='20' width='760' height='60' rx='10' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <text x='40' y='60' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>予定編集</text>
    
    <rect x='40' y='100' width='720' height='440' rx='10' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>

  </svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
    
    <!-- ヘッダー -->
    <rect width='800' height='60' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <text x='20' y='40' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>友達リスト</text>
    
    <!-- 友達追加ボタン -->
    <rect x='680' y='15' width='100' height='30' rx='15' fill='#50E3C2'/>
    <text x='700' y='35' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>友達追加</text>
    
    <!-- 検索バー -->
    <rect x='20' y='80' width='760' height='40' rx='20' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
    <text x='50' y='105' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>友達を検索...</text>
    <circle cx='750' cy='100' r='10' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <line x1='745' y1='105' x2='755' y2='95' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
    <line x1='745' y1='95' x2='755' y2='105' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
    
    <!-- 友達リスト -->
    <rect x='20' y='140' width='760' height='440' rx='10' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
    
    <!-- 友達1 -->
    <circle cx='60' cy='190' r='25' fill='#F5A623'/>
    <text x='100' y='195' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>田中太郎</text>
    <text x='100' y='215' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#888888'>@tanaka_taro</text>
    
    <!-- 友達2 -->
    <circle cx='60' cy='270' r='25' fill='#50E3C2'/>
    <text x='100' y='275' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>佐藤花子</text>
    <text x='100' y='295' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#888888'>@sato_hanako</text>
    
    <!-- 友達3 -->
    <circle cx='60' cy='350' r='25' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <text x='100' y='355' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>鈴木一郎</text>
    <text x='100' y='375' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#888888'>@suzuki_ichiro</text>
    
    <!-- 分割線 -->
    <line x1='20' y1='230' x2='780' y2='230' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
    <line x1='20' y1='310' x2='780' y2='310' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
    
    <!-- ステータスアイコン -->
    <circle cx='740' cy='190' r='8' fill='#4CAF50'/>
    <circle cx='740' cy='270' r='8' fill='#FFC107'/>
    <circle cx='740' cy='350' r='8' fill='#F44336'/>
    
    <!-- フッター -->
    <rect y='560' width='800' height='40' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <text x='20' y='585' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>© 2023 フリータイムシェア</text>
  </svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
  
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='800' height='60' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <text x='20' y='38' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>友達追加</text>
  
  <rect x='20' y='80' width='760' height='50' rx='25' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='50' y='112' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>ユーザー名またはメールアドレスで検索</text>
  <circle cx='740' cy='105' r='15' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <path d='M735 105 L745 105 M740 100 L740 110' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
  
  <rect x='20' y='150' width='760' height='400' rx='10' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  
  <text x='40' y='190' font-family='Arial' font-size='18' font-weight='bold' fill='#333333'>検索結果</text>
  
  <g transform='translate(40 220)'>
    <circle cx='25' cy='25' r='25' fill='#50E3C2'/>
    <text x='60' y='30' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>山田太郎</text>
    <text x='60' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>yamada@example.com</text>
    <rect x='620' y='10' width='80' height='30' rx='15' fill='#F5A623'/>
    <text x='635' y='30' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>友達申請</text>
  </g>
  
  <g transform='translate(40 300)'>
    <circle cx='25' cy='25' r='25' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <text x='60' y='30' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>佐藤花子</text>
    <text x='60' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>sato@example.com</text>
    <rect x='620' y='10' width='80' height='30' rx='15' fill='#F5A623'/>
    <text x='635' y='30' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>友達申請</text>
  </g>
  
  <g transform='translate(40 380)'>
    <circle cx='25' cy='25' r='25' fill='#F5A623'/>
    <text x='60' y='30' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>鈴木一郎</text>
    <text x='60' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>suzuki@example.com</text>
    <rect x='620' y='10' width='80' height='30' rx='15' fill='#F5A623'/>
    <text x='635' y='30' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>友達申請</text>
  </g>
  
  <text x='40' y='530' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>表示されているのは検索結果の一部です。さらに表示するにはスクロールしてください。</text>
</svg>"
}

value.screenName: スケジュール共有リンク生成画面
value.value:
{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
    
    <rect x='20' y='20' width='760' height='60' fill='#4A90E2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='40' y='60' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>スケジュール共有リンク生成</text>
    
    <rect x='40' y='100' width='720' height='100' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1' rx='5'/>
    <text x='60' y='130' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>有効期限設定</text>
    <rect x='60' y='140' width='200' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='70' y='165' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>日付を選択</text>
    <path d='M240 155 L250 165 L230 165 Z' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    
    <rect x='300' y='140' width='200' height='40' fill='#50E3C2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='350' y='165' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>リンク生成</text>
    
    <rect x='40' y='220' width='720' height='100' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1' rx='5'/>
    <text x='60' y='250' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>生成されたリンク</text>
    <rect x='60' y='260' width='600' height='40' fill='#F0F0F0' rx='5'/>
    <text x='70' y='285' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>https://freetimeshare.com/share/abcdef123456</text>
    <rect x='680' y='260' width='60' height='40' fill='#F5A623' rx='5'/>
    <text x='695' y='285' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>コピー</text>
    
    <rect x='40' y='340' width='720' height='220' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1' rx='5'/>
    <text x='60' y='370' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>共有リンクのプレビュー</text>
    <rect x='60' y='380' width='680' height='160' fill='#F0F0F0' rx='5'/>
    <rect x='80' y='400' width='640' height='30' fill='#4A90E2' rx='3'/>
    <text x='90' y='420' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>月曜日</text>
    <rect x='80' y='440' width='160' height='80' fill='#50E3C2' rx='3'/>
    <text x='100' y='480' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#FFFFFF'>10:00 - 12:00</text>
    <text x='100' y='500' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#FFFFFF'>空き時間</text>
    <rect x='260' y='440' width='160' height='80' fill='#F5A623' rx='3'/>
    <text x='280' y='480' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#FFFFFF'>14:00 - 16:00</text>
    <text x='280' y='500' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#FFFFFF'>予定あり</text>
  </svg>"
}

value.screenName: 共有スケジュール表示画面
value.value:
{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
    
    <!-- ヘッダー -->
    <rect x='0' y='0' width='800' height='60' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <text x='20' y='40' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>共有スケジュール</text>
    
    <!-- カレンダー -->
    <rect x='40' y='80' width='720' height='400' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
    <line x1='40' y1='120' x2='760' y2='120' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
    
    <!-- 曜日 -->
    <text x='80' y='110' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>月</text>
    <text x='180' y='110' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>火</text>
    <text x='280' y='110' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>水</text>
    <text x='380' y='110' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>木</text>
    <text x='480' y='110' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>金</text>
    <text x='580' y='110' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>土</text>
    <text x='680' y='110' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>日</text>
    
    <!-- 時間帯 -->
    <text x='10' y='160' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#666666'>9:00</text>
    <text x='10' y='220' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#666666'>12:00</text>
    <text x='10' y='280' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#666666'>15:00</text>
    <text x='10' y='340' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#666666'>18:00</text>
    <text x='10' y='400' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#666666'>21:00</text>
    
    <!-- 空き時間表示 -->
    <rect x='80' y='140' width='80' height='60' fill='#50E3C2' opacity='0.7'/>
    <rect x='280' y='260' width='80' height='120' fill='#50E3C2' opacity='0.7'/>
    <rect x='480' y='380' width='80' height='60' fill='#50E3C2' opacity='0.7'/>
    
    <!-- 凡例 -->
    <rect x='40' y='500' width='20' height='20' fill='#50E3C2' opacity='0.7'/>
    <text x='70' y='515' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>空き時間</text>
    
    <!-- 共有情報 -->
    <text x='40' y='550' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>共有ユーザー: 田中太郎</text>
    <text x='40' y='570' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#666666'>共有期間: 2023/6/1 - 2023/6/7</text>
    
    <!-- 閉じるボタン -->
    <rect x='660' y='530' width='100' height='40' rx='20' fill='#F5A623'/>
    <text x='690' y='555' font-family='Arial' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>閉じる</text>
  </svg>"
}

value.screenName: プロフィール設定画面
value.value:
{"svg":"<svg width=\"800\" height=\"600\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\">
  <rect width=\"800\" height=\"600\" fill=\"#F8F8F8\"/>
  
  <rect x=\"0\" y=\"0\" width=\"800\" height=\"60\" fill=\"#4A90E2\"/>
  <text x=\"20\" y=\"40\" font-family=\"Arial\" font-size=\"24\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\">プロフィール設定</text>
  
  <rect x=\"40\" y=\"100\" width=\"720\" height=\"440\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" rx=\"10\"/>
  
  <text x=\"80\" y=\"160\" font-family=\"Arial\" font-size=\"18\" fill=\"#333333\">ユーザー名</text>
  <rect x=\"80\" y=\"180\" width=\"640\" height=\"50\" fill=\"#F8F8F8\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <text x=\"100\" y=\"212\" font-family=\"Arial\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#333333\">現在のユーザー名</text>
  
  <text x=\"80\" y=\"260\" font-family=\"Arial\" font-size=\"18\" fill=\"#333333\">メールアドレス</text>
  <rect x=\"80\" y=\"280\" width=\"640\" height=\"50\" fill=\"#F8F8F8\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <text x=\"100\" y=\"312\" font-family=\"Arial\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#333333\">current@example.com</text>
  
  <text x=\"80\" y=\"360\" font-family=\"Arial\" font-size=\"18\" fill=\"#333333\">新しいパスワード</text>
  <rect x=\"80\" y=\"380\" width=\"640\" height=\"50\" fill=\"#F8F8F8\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <text x=\"100\" y=\"412\" font-family=\"Arial\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#CCCCCC\">パスワードを入力してください</text>
  
  <rect x=\"300\" y=\"460\" width=\"200\" height=\"50\" fill=\"#50E3C2\" rx=\"25\"/>
  <text x=\"370\" y=\"492\" font-family=\"Arial\" font-size=\"18\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" text-anchor=\"middle\">保存</text>
  
  <circle cx=\"740\" cy=\"40\" r=\"15\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\"/>
  <path d=\"M733 33 L747 47 M747 33 L733 47\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
</svg>"}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
    
    <text x='40' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='24' font-weight='bold' fill='#333333'>通知設定</text>
    
    <rect x='40' y='80' width='720' height='1' fill='#E0E0E0'/>
    
    <g transform='translate(40 120)'>
      <text font-family='Arial' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>メール通知</text>
      <rect x='600' y='-10' width='60' height='30' rx='15' fill='#4A90E2'/>
      <circle cx='640' cy='5' r='12' fill='#FFFFFF'/>
    </g>
    
    <g transform='translate(40 180)'>
      <text font-family='Arial' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>プッシュ通知</text>
      <rect x='600' y='-10' width='60' height='30' rx='15' fill='#E0E0E0'/>
      <circle cx='610' cy='5' r='12' fill='#FFFFFF'/>
    </g>
    
    <g transform='translate(40 240)'>
      <text font-family='Arial' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>通知頻度</text>
      <rect x='400' y='-15' width='260' height='40' rx='5' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0'/>
      <text x='420' y='15' font-family='Arial' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>リアルタイム</text>
      <path d='M630 5 l10 -5 l0 10 z' fill='#333333'/>
    </g>
    
    <rect x='40' y='300' width='720' height='1' fill='#E0E0E0'/>
    
    <rect x='300' y='340' width='200' height='50' rx='25' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <text x='370' y='372' font-family='Arial' font-size='18' font-weight='bold' fill='#FFFFFF'>保存</text>
    
    <g transform='translate(700 20)'>
      <circle cx='0' cy='0' r='30' fill='#50E3C2'/>
      <path d='M-15 0 l10 10 l20 -20' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/>
    </g>
  </svg>"
}
